entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running tests tries to run .NET Framework tests with mono on non-Windows #81395
  • OCSP revocation check does not work on Linux container #81392
  • [6.0] multiple CI test failure in Linux arm build #81391
  • [release/6.0] CI failure in JIT.Methodical.eh tests run in Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono_RuntimeTests #81388
  • Do not use dummy types in SR class #81385
    Future
  • Improve codegen for Unsafe.AreSame #81386
  • Several GC test failures found CI build of PR porting into [release/6.0] #81383
  • NativeAOT publish should respect updating FrameworkReference RuntimeFrameworkVersion #81382
  • "Invalid argument" exception when setting Socket.ReceiveTimeout on macOS ARM64 #81378
  • [API Proposal]: Add Decimal32, Decimal64, and Decimal128 from the IEEE 754-2019 standard. #81376
    8.0.0
  • GetTimeZoneIds empty on Android devices/emulators API 21-25 #81373
    Future
  • MaxWorkingSet has wrong value when setting container memory limit #81372
  • It should not be possible to set Activity parent after activity is started #81371
    Future
  • Redundant block counter in a single-block method #81369
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Move WasmAppBuilder into transport -> SDK #81367
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsInt(type)' in 'System.Tests.UInt128Tests_GenericMath:TrailingZeroCountTest()' during 'Do value numbering' (IL size 111; hash 0x36fbe8ed; FullOpts) #81366
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices\callconvs\TestCallingConventions #81365
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread #81363
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest #81362
    8.0.0
  • baseservices\exceptions\stackoverflow\stackoverflowtester fails under pgo stress on windows arm #81360
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Data flow annotations are not applied to DI created generic types #81358
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!tree->IsUnusedValue() || (dstCount != 0)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #81356
  • [corehost] Return value of library_exists_in_dir is disregarded #81355
  • [browser] Implement deeper JSImport marshaling metadata #81348
    Future
  • Reflection Loader search has changed since 4.6, and seems wrong now #81341

Closed

  • Perf summary : Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Formatting.NoArguments #81230
    Future
  • Perf Summary : System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Get.GetDateTimeOffset #80836
  • Publish size regression on Linux #81374
  • [Question] JIT codegen difference between 6.0 and 7.0 for BitOperations.Log2_uint #79058
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 8 #77391
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Prefer .Length/Count/IsEmpty over Any() #75933
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement decimal floating-point types that conform to the IEEE 754 standard. #69777
    Future
  • Switch/check for NativeAOT and reflection-free mode. #81370
  • PrivateFontCollection not working in Linux #26460
    Future
  • [wasm] [debugger] `MonoProxy` behaves incorrectly when value for the `columnNumber` property is missing in `Debugger.setBreakpointByUrl` call #81321
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM with MSAL auth in Safari throws System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: TypeError: Load failed #79406
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #79976
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'dest->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' in 'Vector2_3_4Test:RunVector2Tests()' during 'Morph - Global' (IL size 348; hash 0xcf5ce7a3; FullOpts) #81048
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonConverter to deserialize Dictionary<string,object> as values objects not JsonElements #81270
  • [QUIC] HandleWriteStartState should behave similarly to reading #55817
    Future
  • [QUIC] Server closes connections with `USER_CANCELED` when server options callback fails #73152
    Future
  • JIT might emit unnecessary null check when enumerating arrays of KVP #67739
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Block morph can avoid creating stores for dead fields #80498
    Future
  • Is Use of the Microsoftl.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces Library Actually Supported? #81313
  • OneLocBuild is failing in official builds #80729
  • Assertion failed 'dest->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' in 'Vector2_3_4Test:RunVector2Tests()' #79626
    8.0.0
  • STJ should support deserializing/serializing nested polymorphism #81279
  • Don't use System.Linq.Expressions in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory with AOT #81258
  • The runtime appears to enable termination on heap corruption #81342

PullRequests

Created

  • Disallow setting Parent on the started Activity #81394
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fully resolve WasmNativeWorkload and WasmNativeWorkloadAvailable #81393
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix the case where net6 AutoImports sets WasmNativeWorkload true and … #81390
    area-Build-mono
  • More frozen collection perf, test, and cleanup improvements #81389
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Re-enable producing call stack from crashreport.json #81387
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Address ConfigurationBinder feedback #81384
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Narrow PAL tests for _vsnprintf_s #81381
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • JIT: change profile slop assert to a jitdump note #81377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update fgGetTopLevelQmark to handle GT_LCL_FLD #81375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles tests #81368
    area-System.IO, os-android
  • [mono][ios] Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #81361
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2100338 #81359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81350
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • Rewrite SpanHelpers.IndexOfNullByte/IndexOfNullCharacter to unmanaged pointers #81347
    area-System.Memory
  • Improve and dedup GetNonZeroBytes #81340
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: build pred lists before instrumentation #81288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Icu wasi package #81345
    area-Build-mono
  • Revert "Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create st… #81379
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix firefox tests #81364
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove additional null-check from ActivityCreationOptions #81351
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Default null columnNumber to 0 #81336
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #81320
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Disable function pointer test for crossgen due to an existing issue #81286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid creating stores to dead fields in block morphing #81095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete HeapEnableTerminationOnCorruption setting #81343
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Re-enable OneLocBuild #81296
    area-Infrastructure
  • fix fgMorphArgs for stress mode #81346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More thoroughly check for function pointers #81344
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix SslStream IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Android API 21-27 #81224
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Add reflection path for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #81262
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Change Nullability annotation on `ISelectionService.PrimarySelection` #81254
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Eliminate a bounds check in `NumberBuffer` #81039
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Declare CoreClrPgoDataArg variable in CI script #80324
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ReaderWriterLock when using it in recursive scenarios and multiple instances on the same thread #81257
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Remove types deriving from JsonTypeInfo<T> and mark as sealed. #81306
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] Calling JS functions from workers + config loading #81273
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Loop alignment support for xarch #81206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    area-System.Resources
  • Fix nullability on `IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer` #81203
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Initial comit for Stream boilerplate source-gen #2185
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement cached interface dispatch for WASM #2184

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement delegate constructors and managed helpers #2180
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge to apr 20 #2181

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet clean` (`--all`?) can always fail before a build is run for apps with a `RuntimeIdentifier` #30199
  • .NET 7 Android TrimmerRootDescriptor vs TrimmerRootAssembly #30192

Closed

  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK zip installed on local OS, some garbled characters appear when installing wasm-tools for the first time #24757
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Create the Publish temp folder for Zip deploy if not exist #30201
    Area-WebSDK
  • Update the target framework for the non-restored test projects #30190
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Refactor CSharpSyntaxWrite. Introduce SingleLineStatement, FieldDeclaration, BodyBlock, TypeDeclaration *CSharpSyntaxRewriter. #30141
    Area-GenAPI
  • add named monitor for fixing floating tests #30138
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port two better fixes for installer crashes from main #30057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Consider having enums auto-implement IEquatable<T> #2349
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perfect Hash-based dispatch for integer switch case #66604
  • Difference between IIncrementalGenerator RegisterImplementationSourceOutput vs RegisterSourceOutput #66601
  • Refactoring a method with "Change Signature" adds unnecessary named argument labels when caller has in-order argument label #66600
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66597
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysisis.Scripting.ScriptOptions' threw an exception. #66592

Closed

  • SourceGenerators in shared compilation can cause MissingMethodException #66104
    17.6
  • Reenable AssemblyLoading_MultipleVersions_ExactAndGreaterMatch #60763
    17.6
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods in `SyntaxGenerator` #66375
  • Code Cleanup / IDE0032 causes errors in partial classes with manual properties #66320
    Backlog
  • Avoid including pdb in NuGet packages #66595
  • The SyntaxGenerator adds redundant static keyword to constant fields #66380
  • Add support for a generation of a finalizer (destructor) in the `SyntaxGenerator` #66374
  • Switch `EmitContext` to hold a syntax reference instead of a syntax node #66371
    17.6
  • Proposal: Allow specifying directory for Source Generator emitted files #66122
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix semicolon placement in statement-placement fixer #66610
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer suggestion to swap ref-structs/pointers using a tuple #66609
    Area-IDE
  • Keep identity struct casts that may be necessary to preserve semantics #66607
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 Servicing: Fix null ref in change signature #66606
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 servicing: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66605
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `default` constraint on an override when needed. #66603
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading default values in IVisualStudioStorageReadFallback implementations #66599
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove BCL dependencies from insertion list #66602
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix serialization of CSharpIdeCodeStyleOptions.Common options #66501
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Add support for generating explicit-interface members from SyntaxGenerator #66598
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not restrict field locations to the same document for "Replace with autoproperty" refactoring #66555
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not emit 'static' modifier on 'const' field #66594
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Instrumentation state #66429
    Next
  • Add support for generating destructors in SyntaxGenerator #66593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable static restore in more locations #66567
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66591
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66611
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Introduce parameter - don't offer for arguments or attribute arguments #66577
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support parameter binding for types that implement `BindAsync` #46338
    8.0-preview2
  • Support parameter binding for body or service parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #46337
    8.0-preview2
  • Support binding from types defined with an `AsParameters` attribute #46336
    8.0-preview2
  • Support TryParse parameter-binding scenarios in RequestDelegateGenerator #46335
    8.0-preview2
  • HubConnectionBuilder Connection to UDS (Unix Domain Socket) #46334
  • OutputCacheMiddleware throws NullReferenceException when trying to serve requests from cache #46333
  • Add support for validating nullability warnings in RequestDelegateGenerator #46331
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT` no longer overrides `DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT` #46325
  • Productize QuickGrid #46317
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unable to publish while using Load on demand to publish the project #46315
    Backlog
  • App startup time performance with many Minimal APIs #46313

Closed

  • Dotnet runtime 6.0.12 not getting updated in Azure App Service #45923
  • Add API to System.Web adapters to enable explicitly mapping Blazor pages #46170
  • IsTfaEnabled #45874
    8.0-preview2
  • Use more localized strategy for resolving WellKnownTypes in analyzers #44090
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Prerendered textarea elements don't have any initial value #45967
    8.0-preview2
  • When will be implemented injecting to class/viewModel in Blazor? #46311
  • AddStackExchangeRedisCache & ForceReconnect for Azure App Service Linux containers #39082
    .NET 8 Planning
  • XML request [FromBody] results in 415 error #46316
  • SIGTERM signal in .NET 6 app deployed in azure Kubernetes service is not triggered #45366
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix casing in Api template #46329
    area-mvc
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve DFA matcher builder startup performance with many constraints #46323
    Perf, area-mvc, blog-candidate
  • Change ErrorViewModel class to record #46319
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update WebApplication XML comment punctuation. #46314
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use new MemoryExtensions.Count and Json.WriteRawValue methods #46332
    8.0-preview1
  • Change IsTfaEnabled to IsTwoFactorEnabledAsync #46258
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Prerender value of textarea element as text content #46326
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ec25eea` to `b722020` #46320
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `83c2bdc` to `69dd8ae` #46321
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Source-build should also use the release runtime. #46299
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    area-runtime
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fix Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #46251
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0.4
  • Install VS Community by default #46262
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview2 #46282
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • Bump ua-parser-js from 0.7.32 to 0.7.33 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #46295
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App does not register on default build #13007
  • When checked on switch in table view button in ViewCell is invisible in Android Platform #13006
  • MAUI FlexLayout in a Grid Row of Height Auto will throw exception #13004
  • Maui App LifeCycle broken on Android #13000
  • How to downgrade maui sdk from 7.0.58 to 7.0.52 #12998
  • Entry Background Color not Changed when using inside the styles in MainPage.xaml #12991
    Backlog
  • Build `Android` fail #12990
  • Android TableView's ViewCell won't calculate height correctly #12989
    Backlog

Closed

  • Missing property for Entry control (TextContentType) #12985
  • No MAUI workload #13001
  • Failed to create release build in iOS due to bitcode issue of Plugin.Firebase in .net MAUI having dotnet 7. #13005
  • Picker without ItemsSource cannot display added items on WinUI #12402
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #12055
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Stacktrace from crashes initiated from Button.Clicked and synchronous code lack relevant stacktrace information #12853
  • MAUI Flyout doesnt work on Android when not using Shell #10274
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Hiding Entry underline inside compile directive does not work #12771
  • Consider implementing tooltip support for .NET 6 #12598
    Backlog
  • Toast throws exception on Windows #12976
  • `INavigation.PopModalAsync` fires `ApplyQueryAttributes` #12630
  • How to disable bitcode strip in Plugin.Firebase in .net 7. It causing issue in iOS in .net MAUI, unable to make release build. #12993
  • Animation crashes app when size is less than zero #7953
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS Debugger Indicates App Has Terminated Immediately #9056
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [mega-pipeline] Update folder nuget source when installing .net #13003
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Removed duplicated item in the Core section from the Gallery #12997
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix issue changing Picker ItemsSource #13002
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Add more logging for BlazorWebView (#12357) #12801
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [net7.0] Flag valid measure status in iOS backing views to avoid repeat measuring #12933
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.10 to 1.1.0.11 #12837
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12936
    area/controls 🎮
  • Mega pipeline #12963
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "[net8.0] Merge main into net8" #12964
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • ItemContentControl - apply bindings once for ItemTemplate (Windows) #10999
    community ✨
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • fix issue 9255 (Wrong Date format DatePicker Windows) #11073
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨
  • [Build] Mega pipeline net8 #12966
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12971
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12939
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #12941
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate does not work with owned Entities #30176
  • Exception in EF Core SQLite (7.0.2) with Net Topology Suite (7.0.2) #30175

Closed

  • ORA-01460: unimplemented or unreasonable conversion requested for more than 32kb size string even after giving conversion #30153
  • EFCore - DI - How to initialize service only once per unique DBContext #30131
  • EF Core 7 json columns , properties are not serialized #30126
  • OnConfiguring no longer has condition to check !optionsBuilder.IsConfigured #30168
  • Complex query generated for Include(Where).SingleOrDefault #30170
  • Be more forgiving on DbContext name for migrations #30145
  • EF Core 7 now warns about missing ValueComparer despite it being set #30139
  • Support the new BCL DateOnly and TimeOnly structs for SQL Server #24507
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support for DateOnly/TimeOnly for SQL Server #30109

Updated

  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Optional workloads do not work in .NET 8 builds #15348

PullRequests

Created

  • Test installer flow #15373
  • Update source-build artifacts to be coherent #15372
  • Add emsdk Manifest-only build to VMR #15371
  • Test bad target from sdk #15370
  • Pull in razor fix to address prebuilts #15369

Merged

  • Add selective unzipping to avoid ASP.NET clobbering NetCore.App #15272
  • Add a baseline for VMR binary scan #15359
  • Update illink versions #15364

Updated

  • Include .version file in SB artifacts tarball #15353
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2100231 #15354
  • tests: ExecuteRunWeb: update expected SIGTERM exit code on mono. #15341
    Area-SourceBuild
  • add tests for covering adding item templates (C# and VB) #15343
